website_summaries.verdict: Features a contemporary design that looks modern, but still classic. A truly functional focus piece for any front room.
pros: Stands out for its sleek, functional design
The button indents, and wooden legs have a timeless feel, but a modern finish
Plush and comfortable to sit on

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sofa! It came in two giant boxes and I was so worried that I purchased something too big! It is big but I don't need any other furniture. This is the star of my living room. The fabric is soft and almost jersey like. It's stiff but not uncomfortable. The wooden bottom is beautiful. Easy to put together. No scuffs. The shipping was faster than expected. I really couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I bought only the teal chaise, not the full sectional. The color is so much richer in person, it’s truly stunning. Everything seems well sewn, the wood is lovely and the quality is high. The chaise is very firm, but not uncomfortably so. It’s really a statement piece and it is perfect on its own. I was also very happy with the delivery and the packaging. It arrived a full week ahead of when it was projected to be delivered. The company stayed in close communication to arrange delivery, I was very happy with them. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hooks

customer_reviews.title: The sofa does look great but at isn't super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sofa does look great but at isn't super comfortable. The fabric/cushions don't look high quality, time will tell. My sofa arrived with scratches and a missing part, clearly indicating it was refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: Matt A.

customer_reviews.title: We are so pleased with how it brightens up the room
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely stunning couch! We are so pleased with how it brightens up the room. It's firm but very comfortable. We had to bring it through 4 doorways, down a flight of stairs, and around a tight corner and it fit without any trouble. My only complaint is that the couch arrived well *ahead* of schedule. This could be problematic, but we received two phone calls ahead of time so it was fine for us and should be fine for most customers (and in fact it was great to get it early!).
customer_reviews.author: Emily Redd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but the assembly is a little tricky.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the look and quality of this sectional. It's exactly what I've been looking for. The only negative is that the instructions could be a little clearer. I also thought installing the legs would be simple but they're a bit difficult and involved and the placement of the connector for the sofa and the chaise isn't very clear.However, we figured it out and once assembled, I was thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy, firm
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sofa. We got the L-shaped sectional and it is modular so you can put it together in several different ways. We currently have the two "loveseats" put together as one long couch and the "corner couch" as a separate seat. This set is quite firm, so this is not for you if you want something soft and squishy.
customer_reviews.author: Broadbent

customer_reviews.title: You Will Love This Couch
customer_reviews.text: The couch is extremely well made and surpassed our expectations. It's also larger than we anticipated. The chaise lounge portion comfortably seats my daughter and I with room to spare. It's much, much better quality than we expected for this price and the fabric is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, too firm for me
customer_reviews.text: Good looking unit, but too firm to be comfortable for me and i was concerned about the longevity of the fabric, nicely made but i ended up returning it. The three pieces i wanted would have been around $2000 total but i will buy furniture locally in future i think
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item was not as described
customer_reviews.text: Although the ad says you're purchasing a "2 piece" sectional sofa I only received 1 piece for the $1408 I paid. :(
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Made for taller people
customer_reviews.text: First of all - this sofa is way too firm. If you want to be comfortable and enjoy your sitting time - look elsewhere. The style of the sofa is awesome and is what attracted me to purchase it. But if you are shorter than 5'8" your feet might dangle off the ground and your back won't reach the seat rest unless you use pillows. I had to return it and purchased a sofa that has softer cushions and was lower and not as deep.
customer_reviews.author: Super

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect hardware sent
customer_reviews.text: I have been in contact with customer support for over a week. Incorrect hardware sent and I cannot put couch together. Will have to send back couch if correct hardware is not sent to me. Very disappointed. Big purchase and now I can’t get correct hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the sectional!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it look amazing, but it was also quite easy to put together AND take apart again when we decided to place a rug partially underneath it. It is a firm sectional as mid-century modern furniture often is. This is something we wanted as we both have bad backs. Based on how sturdy it is, I have a feeling this sectional will last a very long time. We are both extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta L Wands

customer_reviews.title: Received half the order and broken, to boot!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the sectional (loveseat + chaise) and only received the loveseats. To add insult to injury, the loveseat came with no legs and broken! —Update— Called Amz customer support and they coordinated to pickup the broken sofa and leave a full-replacement. I’ll update the stars as this develops.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This chair is lovely!!!! I am moving to a larger place and plan to buy the whole set! Delivery was prompt and efficient!
customer_reviews.author: marie taylor

customer_reviews.title: Classic, clean, pretty!
customer_reviews.text: The corner sofa arrived yesterday in very good condition. The legs were easy to install. It is a classic, clean line. Fairly comfortable. I had the two brown pillows from my large sofa and added to this one for extra comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great set - Goldilocks size
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, perfect size and comfortable. Matches our mid-century + farmhouse home really well. Came with a small scuff on the wood part, but assume that was an isolated incident - Amazon was good to give a small discount for that
customer_reviews.author: Huan Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Our gorgeous couch was delivered on time when it was 37 below zero. (Great service!!) We have had it one month and love it more and more for it's durability and fantastic style. So cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful couch! It's definitely on the firm side of comfort. The color and fabric are beautiful. We are not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price - Good but quite hard
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but for comfort level it is quite hard.
customer_reviews.author: Prosado

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and versatility of this corner chair! I bought it in teal- gorgeous color! My daughter recently moved out so I have this in my new ‘lounge”. I also purchased the ottoman, and change up where I place the ottoman The chair is somewhat firm but comfortable. I do have pillows around the back and there is still ample seating room. Overall I would recommend this corner chair
customer_reviews.author: Chasejonessauer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to put together, firm, but not uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Angeliki

customer_reviews.title: Great sectional as long as not ordered from appliance connections
customer_reviews.text: Love the sectional. firm but very comfy. Just dont order from appliances connection website. Terrible company. I hope amazon delivers better
customer_reviews.author: anna sierdzinska

product_meta.title: Modway Engage Mid-Century Modern Upholstered Fabric Left-Facing Sectional Sofa in Expectation Gray
product_meta.description: Size:Left-Facing Sectional Sofa| Color:Expectation GrayGently sloping curves and large dual cushions create a favorite lounging spot. Whether plopping down after a long day at work, settling in with coffee and brunch, or entering a spirited discussion with friends, the Engage Living Room Set is a welcome presence in your home. Buttons create eye catching appeal; adding depth that brings your sitting décor to center stage. Four rubber wood legs and frame supply a solid base to the comfortable upholstered material.
feature_bullets: CONTEMPORARY STYLE - The roomy depth and iconic look of Engage showcase mid-century modern design. Boasting tailored lines and a hopeful style, this piece embodies retro intrigue and sophistication.

FINE UPHOLSTERY - Upholstered in quality polyester fabric, Engage emboldens décor with a design worth remembering. This distinctive collection makes for a striking statement brimming with possibility.
MODERN LOUNGE SPOT - A preferred seat for lounge spaces of all types, Engage offers a supportive place to rest while delving deep into conversation or sipping a steaming cup of tea or coffee.

SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION - The focal point of any room, Engage is expertly crafted and sits atop splayed and tapered cherry-colored solid wood legs. Make your living or lounge room memorable with Engage.
SECTIONAL MEASUREMENTS - Loveseat Dimensions: 35"L x 73"W x 32.5 - 33.5"H; Chaise Dimensions: 69.5"L x 36.5"W x 33.5"H; Cushion Thickness: 6"; Weight Capacity: 1300 lbs Loveseat / 1300 lbs Chaise

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars37 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
